original_text:
This is what the Lord says:
“What fault did your ancestors find in me,
    that they strayed so far from me?
They followed worthless idols
    and became worthless themselves.
korean_text: 나 여호와가 이와 같이 말하노라 너희 조상들이 내게서 무슨 불의함을 보았기에 나를 멀리 하고 가서 헛된 것을 따라 헛되이 행하였느냐

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord says:
What fault did your ancestors find in me,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 조상들이 나에게서 무슨 허물을 찾았느냐

sentences.original_text: that they strayed so far from me?
